accessToken.title: Access Token

instanceDomain.title: Instance Domain
instanceDomain.description: URL of your Domo instance, e.g., https://openmetadata.domo.com

databaseName.title: Database Name
databaseName.description: Optional name to give to the database in OpenMetadata. If left blank, we will use default as the database name.

tableFilterPattern.description: Regex to only include/exclude tables that matches the pattern.
